title: Goals as a Developer
content: To consistently write quality code that follows industry best practices
To make a noticeably positive impact on a team, product or company
To continuously learn, credential and improve utilizing all available resources

title: My Skillset
content: My ability to learn and problem solve are my greatest skills
JavaScript is my strongest language, followed by Python and C#
I can use and understand many frameworks, libraries and database and algorithm concepts

title: Ideal Work Environment
content: Possesses an overall positive and productive atmosphere
Has passionate team members who enjoy collaborating
Offers exciting and cutting edge work assignments and clients
